name: chris-snowden.me
description: Personal website/portfolio - Inspired by 80s neon aesthetic - Using Eleventy with a sprinkling of Svelte and Netlify
author: Chris Snowden <cdsnowden@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style
scripts.release:major: changelog -M -t v1.0.0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG after major release' && npm version major -m 'chore(release): upgrade to major version %s'
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -t v1.0.0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG after minor release' && npm version minor -m 'chore(release): upgrade to minor version %s'
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -t v1.0.0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG after patch release' && npm version patch -m 'chore(release): upgrade to patch version %s'
scripts.postversion: git checkout master && git push && git checkout develop && git push && git push --tags
